messages.messageBody:
Warg3791@... wrote:

>>LOL Actually Sec, that was in PMK Vol 2. Ito over in the Lair only hits on
Takeda. It's the hair. LOL<<



He flirts with Kojima/Sagara over on Lair, too. Probably another hair fetish. And when he can get Takeda and Kojima together... (*wink wink nudge nudge*)

Simply amazing how much you can learn about history being silly in an RPG. If it had been like this in school.... :-D
phil

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] The Shocking Truth of Saitou's Departure
messages.msgSnippet: ... In the first pic, you see Itou privately entertaining Kondou.  Then you cut to the series of frames of Hijikata (? I haven t seen the NHK drama yet) giving
messages.messageBody:
:-D It confused me at first, too, but I got it on the second pass (I hope)...

In the first pic, you see Itou privately entertaining Kondou. Then you cut to the series of frames of Hijikata (? I haven't seen the NHK drama yet) giving Kondou(?) a hard time about being coaxed into something (the allusion being something sexual, obviously) and Kondou telling him Itou did it very well. Then you cut to Hijikata(?) assigning Saitou the task of joining Itou's group and report back on "minute details". The clasping hands kind of says it all. :-D

Any less confused? (And I apologize if I've gotten it wrong or ruined the joke for anyone if I got it right).

phil
